title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 02, 2022

items.title: Awesome PICO 8
items.content_text:
### Contents / Tools

*   [Shrinko8 (⭐117)](https://github.com/thisismypassport/shrinko8) - A minifier that aggressively shrinks Pico-8 code size. Also includes a linter and other tools.
items.content_html:
Contents / Tools

  • Shrinko8 (⭐117) - A minifier that aggressively shrinks Pico-8 code size. Also includes a linter and other tools.

items.title: Awesome Sre
items.content_text:
### Newsletters

*   [Monitoring Weekly](https://monitoring.love/) - What's new in monitoring? Curated monitoring articles to your inbox each week.
*   [Observability news](https://o11y.news/) - Updates around observability (o11y) with a special focus on open source.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Python Typing
items.content_text:
### Backports and improvements

*   [future-typing (⭐18)](https://github.com/PrettyWood/future-typing) - Backport for type hinting generics in standard collections and union types as `X | Y`.
items.content_html:
Backports and improvements

  • future-typing (⭐18) - Backport for type hinting generics in standard collections and union types as X | Y.

items.title: Awesome Jax
items.content_text: ### Libraries / New Libraries * [GPJax (⭐521)](https://github.com/thomaspinder/GPJax) - Gaussian processes in JAX. * [Jumanji (⭐738)](https://github.com/instadeepai/jumanji) - A Suite of Industry-Driven Hardware-Accelerated RL Environments written in JAX.
items.content_html:
Libraries / New Libraries

  • GPJax (⭐521) - Gaussian processes in JAX.
  • Jumanji (⭐738) - A Suite of Industry-Driven Hardware-Accelerated RL Environments written in JAX.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

*   [ioBroker](https://www.iobroker.net/) - Integration platform for the Internet of Things, focused on building automation, smart metering, ambient assisted living, process automation, visualization and data logging. ([Source Code (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker)) `MIT` `Nodejs`

### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [Navidrome Music Server](https://www.navidrome.org) - Modern Music Server and Streamer, compatible with Subsonic/Airsonic. ([Demo](https://www.navidrome.org/demo), [Source Code (⭐15k)](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome), [Clients](https://www.navidrome.org/docs/overview/#apps)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker/Go`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [WeTTY](https://butlerx.github.io/wetty/#/) - Terminal in browser over http/https. ([Source Code (⭐4.6k)](https://github.com/butlerx/wetty)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`
items.content_html:
Software / Internet of Things (IoT)

  • ioBroker - Integration platform for the Internet of Things, focused on building automation, smart metering, ambient assisted living, process automation, visualization and data logging. (Source Code (⭐1.3k)) MIT Nodejs

Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • Navidrome Music Server - Modern Music Server and Streamer, compatible with Subsonic/Airsonic. (Demo, Source Code (⭐15k), Clients) GPL-3.0 Docker/Go

Software / Miscellaneous

  • WeTTY - Terminal in browser over http/https. (Source Code (⭐4.6k)) MIT Docker/Nodejs

(requires Neovim 0.5)

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### Notes and Tasks

*   [AppFlowy](https://www.appflowy.io/) - Open Source Notion Alternative. You are in charge of your data and customizations.
*   [Joplin (⭐50k)](https://github.com/laurent22/joplin) - Note taking and to-do application with synchronisation and encryption capabilities.
*   [Nextcloud Notes (⭐658)](https://github.com/nextcloud/notes/) - The Notes app is a distraction free notes taking app for Nextcloud.
    *   [Nextcloud Notes app (⭐1k)](https://github.com/stefan-niedermann/nextcloud-notes) - An android client for Nextcloud Notes.
*   [Notally (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/OmGodse/Notally) - A beautiful notes app (local only, no sync).
*   [Standard Notes](https://standardnotes.org/) - A free, open-source, and completely encrypted notes app.
*   [TinyList](https://tinylist.app/) - Create and share notes and checklists, without sacrificing your privacy.
*   [YankNote (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/purocean/yn) - A Hackable Markdown Note Application for Programmers.
items.content_html:
Notes and Tasks

  • AppFlowy - Open Source Notion Alternative. You are in charge of your data and customizations.
  • Joplin (⭐50k) - Note taking and to-do application with synchronisation and encryption capabilities.
  • Nextcloud Notes (⭐658) - The Notes app is a distraction free notes taking app for Nextcloud.
    • Nextcloud Notes app (⭐1k) - An android client for Nextcloud Notes.
  • Notally (⭐1.9k) - A beautiful notes app (local only, no sync).
  • Standard Notes - A free, open-source, and completely encrypted notes app.
  • TinyList - Create and share notes and checklists, without sacrificing your privacy.
  • YankNote (⭐5.9k) - A Hackable Markdown Note Application for Programmers.

items.content_html:
Contents / Games

  • Arcade Plaza (⭐31) - Hub of online games built by Aryaman Godara.
